title: Introduction
text: A quick word from the Project Managers of Waterloop, where we’ll share our vision of a sustainable future, the importance of sustainability, and the impact we can provide to the UW community and beyond.

title: A Word from our Keynote Speaker
subtitle: Mike Morrice, MP, Green Party
text: Mike Morrice from the Green Party of Canada is the MP for Kitchener Centre and a Wilfrid Laurier University double degree alumni. Mike aims to put the community first, improving housing affordability, healthcare, promoting arts and culture, and advocating against wealth inequality. Mike supports a science-based climate plan that aims for a 50% emission reduction by 2030, ensuring a just transition where no one is left behind, at the scale of a Green New Deal.

title: Design Team Presentations
text: Waterloo Formula Electric, UWAFT, Midnight Sun, Warrior Home, Sustainable Development Solutions Network, and UW Energy Network will be presenting what it is like to be a part of their team! They will also be talking about their team’s sustainable practices, and how they are helping to shape a greener and cleaner future.

title: Waterloop's Presentation
subtitle: ...followed by Event Conclusion
text: Waterloop is proud to present the benefits of Hyperloop as the fifth mode of transportation. The team is excited to showcase the latest developments on our journey to develop a full scale Hyperloop by 2025 and our overarching vision for improving transportation and sustainability in Canada.
